loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: You need to login first to use AI features. Please choose a login method.

loginExplanation.title: Login Instructions
loginExplanation.description: After logging in, you will be able to use all AI features, including prompt optimization, image generation, etc.

apiConfigInfo.title: API Configuration Instructions
apiConfigInfo.description: You need to configure an API key to use AI features. Your API key will be securely stored in your local browser. For local Ollama access, you can enter any value as the key.

privacyProtection.title: Privacy Protection
privacyProtection.description: Your API key is only stored in your local browser, we do not collect or store your API key information.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive user interface, quick to get started

fastOptimization.title: Fast Optimization
fastOptimization.description: Smart algorithms quickly analyze and optimize prompts

communitySharing.title: Community Sharing
communitySharing.description: Share and exchange prompt experiences with other users

continuousImprovement.title: Continuous Improvement
continuousImprovement.description: Continuously optimize platform features based on user feedback

testimonials.title: User Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Listen to what users say, real feedback witnesses product value

zhang.name: Zhang Ming
zhang.content: This platform has helped me optimize many prompts, greatly improving my writing efficiency. The debugging feature is particularly useful.

li.name: Li Xiaoyu
li.content: There are many high-quality prompt templates on the sharing platform, which helped me quickly find suitable prompts. Very convenient.

wang.name: Wang Developer
wang.content: The visual interface of the debugging tool makes the optimization process intuitive and easy to understand, greatly improving my work efficiency.

cta.title: Ready to Start Optimizing Your Prompts?
cta.subtitle: Experience powerful prompt optimization features immediately, let AI empower your work

description.generate: Generate images from text descriptions with support for multiple models and parameter adjustments
description.edit: Edit uploaded images with mask drawing to specify editing areas

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.uploadText: Upload image to enable edit mode

mask.title: Mask Editing Tools
mask.description: Draw red areas on the image to mark parts that need editing. AI will regenerate the marked areas based on your description.
mask.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: The gpt-image-1 model uses "soft mask" technology and may re-render the entire image for consistency. It's recommended to specify "only edit the masked area, keep other parts unchanged" in the prompt.

prompt.generatePlaceholder: Describe the image you want to generate in detail, for example: A cute orange kitten sitting on a windowsill, with sunlight streaming through the window onto it, with a blurred garden background
prompt.editPlaceholder: Describe what you want to generate in the masked area. Suggested format: "Only edit the masked area, replace it with [specific content], keep other parts of the image completely unchanged"

results.title: Generation Results
results.noImagesGenerate: Enter description text to start generating images
results.noImagesEdit: Upload image and describe editing requirements

optimize.requirementPlaceholder: Describe how you want to optimize this prompt, for example: make the description more vivid and detailed, add lighting and color descriptions...
optimize.checkResult: Check if the optimization result meets your requirements. Click "Insert Optimized Result" to replace the current prompt.
